bug.question: I have spots and I can fly. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have round shapes on my back.
🍃 I like to land on plants.
🐞 My name has the word 'lady' in it.

bug.question: I make honey and buzz. Who am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am often yellow and black.
🌻 I fly around flowers.
🍯 I live in a hive with my friends

bug.question: I wiggle on the ground before I become a butterfly. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I eat a lot of leaves.
🧶 I can be green or brown.
🦋 I turn into something beautiful!

bug.question: I march in a line and carry things. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small.
💪 I am very strong for my size!
🏠 I live in a colony underground.

bug.question: I jump really high and like to eat plants. Who am I?

hints.text: 💚 I am usually green.
🎶 I make a chirping sound.
🌾 I like to eat grass and leaves.

bug.question: I float on the water and zoom around. What am I?

hints.text: 💙 I am often found near ponds.
🌟 I have shiny wings.
🐉 I can catch other bugs.

bug.question: I glow in the dark. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I light up at night.
✨ I use my light to attract a mate.
🌙 You can often find me in meadows

bug.question: I spin a web to catch my food. Who am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I have eight legs.
🕷️ I am not an insect, but I am an arachnid.
🏠 My web can be very sticky.

bug.question: I make a loud noise at night and rub my legs together. What am I?

hints.text: 🌃 I am often heard in the summer.
🌳 I like to live in trees.
🦗 My legs make the sound.

bug.question: I like to eat clothes if you leave them in a dark place. What am I?

hints.text: 👚 I hatch from an egg.
🐛 I eat fabric.
🚪 You don't want to find me in your closet.

ocean.question: I swim in the sea and I go 'glub glub'. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I have fins to help me swim.
💧 I live in the water.
🐟 I'm often colorful.

ocean.question: I'm big and blue, and boats float on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I'm very, very wide.
⛵️ You can swim in me, but be careful!
🐳 Many animals live in me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and I'm very slow. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I live on the land or in the sea.
🥬 I like to eat green things.
🟢 I am often green or brown.

ocean.question: I walk sideways on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I have pincers.
🏖️ I live near the beach.
🔴 I am often red.

ocean.question: I’m a very big fish with sharp teeth! What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 People are sometimes scared of me.
🦷 I have many rows of pointy teeth.
🌊 I swim very fast in the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a home for sea creatures, made of colorful coral. What am I?

hints.text: 🏘️ Many fish like to live here.
🌈 I can be many different colors.
🧱 I'm built by tiny animals.

ocean.question: I'm very large and sing a song. I also squirt water. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I'm a mammal that lives in the ocean.
💧 I breathe air, but live in the sea.
🎶 I make sounds to talk to other of my kind.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can change my color.
💪 I have no bones!
🪨 I like to hide in rocks.

ocean.question: I am a very long fish that looks like a snake. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I have no arms or legs.
🪨 I hide in rocks and coral.
⚡️ Some can give a shock!

ocean.question: I have five arms and I look like a star. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I live on the bottom of the ocean.
🖐️ I have a lot of points.
✨ I can regrow my arms.
